home.name: $t(name)
home.greeting: Hi and nice to meet you!
home.description:
I am a {{age}} year old Computer Science student with a passion for everything that involves computers.

I am currently studying for my Bachelor's degree at $t(uni).

My main focus is on Software Engineering, Web Development and Machine Learning. But I am always eager to learn new things.

about.aboutSub:
I am a passionate software engineer with a strong interest in full-stack development and competitive gaming. I have experience in managing online esports competitions and am currently pursuing a BSc in Information Technology at $t(uni)h.

I enjoy building web applications and exploring new technologies. In my free time, I like to play volleyball and participate in tech projects.

exp1.title: FACEIT Ltd — Competition Coordinator (Remote)
exp1.summary: Ran online esports competitions and enforced game rules.
exp1.details:
• Set up game servers, configured tournaments and brackets.
  • Handled player inquiries on the FACEIT platform and Discord.

exp2.title: FACEIT Ltd — Live Support (Remote)
exp2.summary: Provided real-time player support via LiveChat.
exp2.details: Resolved game and server-related issues and supported players with general questions

exp3.title: Ten Mans Management LLC — Volunteer General Manager
exp3.summary: Helped managing a team of 50 volunteers and 10000+ players.
exp3.details:
• Created and maintained timetables for volunteer admins from all around the world
  • Resolved personal issues between staff members
  • Created tools and programs to improve efficiency and player satisfaction
  • Conducted interviews and provided training to new staff

exp4.title: Ten Mans Management LLC — Volunteer Competition Administrator
exp4.summary: Moderated and enforced rules in online esports competitions.
exp4.details:
• Answered 200+ support tickets on Discord and FACEIT.
  • Helped draft fair-play policies for amateur events.

edu1.title: ETH Zurich — BSc Information Technology (ongoing)
edu1.summary: Studying information technology at ETH Zurich.
edu1.details:
• Key coursework: Algorithms & Data Structures, Graph Theory, Computer Architecture, Multicore Programming.
  • Active in student tech projects and volleyball club.

edu2.title: Richard Fehrenbach-Gewerbeschule — Technisches Gymnasium
edu2.details:
Completed an IT-focused high-school curriculum in Freiburg i. Br.

Built several web-apps in React/TypeScript that sparked my interest in full-stack development.

jbm.title: JB-Maschinenbau
jbm.description: Corporate one-page site in German for JB Maschinenbau. Showcases core mechanical-engineering services, client references and legal info. Designed to build trust and drive direct contact inquiries.

gradetude.title: Gradetude
gradetude.description: Grading‑as‑a‑Service platform for educational institutions. Done as a project for the Fundamentals of Web Engineering course at ETH
gradetude.sub: The platform aims to aid teachers in small institutions to manage and oversee the grading process. It allows teachers create report cards for students based on .docx templating
gradetude.technologies: React ~ Mantine ~ TypeScript ~ Python ~ FastAPI ~ PostgreSQL ~ Kubernetes ~ GitLab

fearless_flex.title: Fearless Flex
fearless_flex.description: Small Webpage to track progress of the Fearless Flexqueue project for the Twitch streamer Noway4u_sir.
fearless_flex.technologies: React ~ Mantine ~ TypeScript ~ NodeJs ~ Express ~ Git ~ GitHub ~ Docker ~ Vite

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.technologies: React ~ TypeScript ~ TailwindCSS ~ Git ~ GitHub ~ Vite

contact.social: ...or contact me on my Social Media
